title: [Social Science] Belief in science predicts face mask wearing behavior during the COVID-19 pandemic in the United States. The findings provide evidence that those who place a greater value in scientific information are more likely to engage in behaviors intended to prevent the spread of the deadly virus.

[Epidemiology] A study by the University of Oxford has found that daily testing of secondary school students who were in contact with someone with COVID-19 was just as effective in controlling school transmission as the current 10-day contact isolation policy
